name: Adalberto AGUIRRE-ARELLANO, petitioner, v. UNITED STATES; Luis Alberto Esparza-Casillas, petitioner, v. United States; Luis Martin Mendoza-Aceves, petitioner, v. United States; Jose Luis Valle-Ramirez, petitioner, v. United States; Jose Emilio Vanegas-Martinez, petitioner, v. United States; and Maximo Anastacio-Morales, petitioner, v. United States.

attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit for further consideration in light of Sessions v. Dimaya, 584 U.S. ----, 138 S.Ct. 1204, 200 L.Ed.2d 549 (2018).
casebody.head_matter:
Adalberto AGUIRRE-ARELLANO, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES; Luis Alberto Esparza-Casillas, petitioner,
v.
United States; Luis Martin Mendoza-Aceves, petitioner,
v.
United States; Daniel Rivera-Hernandez, petitioner,
v.
United States; Albin Alexander Torres, aka Alvin Alexander Torres, aka Albin Alexander Torres-Menjivar, aka Albin Torres-Menjybar, petitioner,
v.
United States; Jose Luis Valle-Ramirez, petitioner,
v.
United States; Jose Emilio Vanegas-Martinez, petitioner,
v.
United States; and Maximo Anastacio-Morales, petitioner,
v.
United States.
No. 16-8675.
Supreme Court of the United States
May 14, 2018.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit for further consideration in light of Sessions v. Dimaya, 584 U.S. ----, 138 S.Ct. 1204, 200 L.Ed.2d 549 (2018).
